title: Effigy Mounds National Monument: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours        Park Rangers provide interpretive talks and tours throughout the summer months. NPS Photo   Â    Guided tours and talks are offered primarily during the summer months.  Check our Calendar page to see specific details and times for interpretive programs. Typical interpretive programs offered during the summer include a 2 mile hike along the Fire Point Trail, special talks presented at the 3 mounds just outside the visitor center, or a demonstration of the ancient spear throwing device called the atlatl.
